definition: to push/to cut/to refuse/to reject/to decline/to shirk (responsibility)/to put off/to delay/to push forward/to nominate/to elect/massage
earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: They needed a bulldozer to dislodge the rock.
sentences.chinese: 他们需要一台推土机来挖出岩石。

sentences.english: The Kid's DOZER is a superb preference for kids.
sentences.chinese: 孩子的推土机是一个极好偏爱的孩子。

sentences.english: The man driving the earthmover is mr . li.
sentences.chinese: 开推土机的那个人是李先生。

sentences.english: To clear that rubbish away they may have to bulldoze.
sentences.chinese: 清除那堆垃圾他们也许得用推土机。

sentences.english: A couple of ex-bulldozer operators and an ex-mason volunteered.
sentences.chinese: 几个开过推土机和当过泥瓦匠的士兵自告奋勇。

sentences.english: Luckily, half-meter snow drifts on the road are sometimes cleaned up by bulldozers…
sentences.chinese: 幸好，有时候推土机会把积得半米高的雪推掉。

sentences.english: What is the total weight of this kind of bulldozer?
sentences.chinese: 这种型号旳推土机总重量是多少？

sentences.english: Really, it's just an excuse to drive a Dozer .
sentences.chinese: 其实，这只是个为了能够开推土机的借口。

sentences.english: Grey whales are submarine bulldozers, feeding on clams and other animals buried in the seabed.
sentences.chinese: 灰鲸是潜艇推土机，喂养蛤蜊和其他埋在海底的动物。

sentences.english: A young boy scavenges for toys in the wheels of a bulldozer.
sentences.chinese: 一名小男孩在一台推土机的轮子里寻觅玩具。

sentences.english: I can't run a bulldozer through my life just because I want to bulldoze yours.
sentences.chinese: 我能不用我的一生开推土机但是因为我想推你的。

sentences.english: Slums can't be bulldozed away overnight to build a theme park.
sentences.chinese: 贫民窟一晚上不能用推土机推平来建立一个主题公园。

sentences.english: Then, three large orange earthmovers blocked our exit.
sentences.chinese: 然后，三辆大型橙色的推土机堵住了出口。

sentences.english: The kids' Dozer is the perfect blend of form and function.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们的推土机是完美的形式和功能。

sentences.english: Then came an earthmover to level off the ground for a fire engine.
sentences.chinese: 接著，推土机前来为消防车开路。

sentences.english: He won the nickname "Bulldozer" for good reason.
sentences.chinese: 他亦因种种善行得到了“推土机”的美名。
